name: Unity (Lio Lim)
description:
Take a moment to listen to the story of lovers from different worlds, running endlessly towards each other with many obstacles in their way. I hope you enjoy this sequel to Uyuni <3

Controls: Up to jump & double jump, Down to roll (no purpose yet!)

Made in 2 weeks for GDKO 2023 - Round 2
Theme: Tell a story using sound.
